entry.title: Friday: Partly cloudy. High minus 27.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 27. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to minus 24 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear after midnight. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h before morning. Temperature rising to minus 24 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Clear. High minus 28.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 28. Wind chill minus 43 in the morning and minus 37 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 27 January 2023
